net.minecraft.block

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.block.Block
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractPressurePlateBlock, AbstractRailBlock, AirBlock, BaseLeavesBlock, BlockWithEntity, BookshelfBlock, CactusBlock, CauldronBlock, class_2099, class_2100, class_2104, class_2107, class_2110, class_2111, class_2113, class_2117, class_2119, class_2120, class_2122, class_2127, class_2128, class_2131, class_2134, class_2136, class_2137, class_2139, class_2140, class_2141, class_2142, class_2157, class_2159, class_2162, class_2164, class_2166, class_2169, class_2172, class_2174, class_2175, class_2179, class_2180, class_2181, class_2182, class_2183, class_2184, class_2185, class_2186, class_2188, class_2191, class_2202, class_2203, ClayBlock, CobwebBlock, DoorBlock, FallingBlock, GlowstoneBlock, HardenedClayBlock, NetherBrickBlock, NetherrackBlock, OreBlock, PackedIceBlock, PlantBlock, RedstoneLampBlock, RedstoneOreBlock, SnowBlock, SoulSandBlock, TransparentBlock

    public class Block
extends Object
    The Block class provides useful methods and fields for creation of Blocks. All blocks extend the Block class. The Block class also registers all the blocks.
